name: Corners - Fluffy Balls HD
description:
Fluffy Balls - fascinating game, based on famous table game "Corners". Excellent training for attention and strategic thinking. Multiplayer mode will bring more fun to any party!

Features of the game:
- Excellent HD graphics.
- Brilliant game design liked by adults and kids.
- Free. Without annoying advertising.
- Play with friends on one tablet or phone (up to 4 players)
- 2 levels of computer skills
